overview: The documentary tells not only the history of the world-famous National Honored Academic People's Choir of Ukraine - Veryovka Ukrainian National Honoured Academic Folk Choir, which has many national and international awards, but also reveals the syncretism of Ukrainian folklore in modern music video clips of famous Ukrainian folk songs, which will help convey the sensual atmosphere of Ukrainian Ethnicity as vividly as possible. the younger generation and not only.
title: Veryovka Choir Now
